issue.title: Jobs for PRs targeted at Gazebo 7 with sdformat4

content.raw:
Hello Shane:

For sometime we have gazebo compiling on Windows for CI but we never get it to really work on Windows so I think that we can not give the different gazebo branches the status of 'supported' until we release a version that actually works.

So I would say: forget about the fixes in the gazebo7 branch and let's focus on the gazebo8. I'm currently fixing the compiling.
content.html:
Hello Shane:

For sometime we have gazebo compiling on Windows for CI but we never get it to really work on Windows so I think that we can not give the different gazebo branches the status of 'supported' until we release a version that actually works.

So I would say: forget about the fixes in the gazebo7 branch and let's focus on the gazebo8. I'm currently fixing the compiling.
